reviewtext: While I am retiring my Phonelink network as I now use Wi-fi everywhere I would like to say that I have been very happy with those cards:They only provide about 10 Mbps but that is good enough to access the Internet.They do not suffer from interference.An interesting fact is that they somehow work on Windows 7 32-bit using the old Windows 2000 driver.
summary: Served me well for over ten years (works fine on Windows 7 32-bit)
